thread.title: Ematic Launches Its HD Intel Quad-Core Windows Tablets Duo with Affordability
thread.title_full: Ematic Launches Its HD Intel Quad-Core Windows Tablets Duo with Affordability - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Ematic Launches Its HD Intel Quad-Core Windows Tablets Duo with Affordability
text:
Ematic Launches Its HD Intel Quad-Core Windows Tablets Duo with Affordability
The LA-based electronic manufacturing company proudly launches two HD Win 8.1 Tablet with superior quality, technology and affordability. They are 8" and 8.95" HD Intel Quad-Core Tablets, with updatability to Win 10. Both of the tablets have 32GB storage and 1GB RAM, a plenty room for downloading videos and games, meanwhile working smoothly. The prices are under $200.
Los Angeles, CA, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Ematic takes a further step to enrich its affordable product portfolio by launching the 8.95” and 8” HD Intel Quad-Core Tablets, with countless highlights including stronger processing power, energy efficiency and even a docking keyboard.
Their Intel Quad-Core Atom processors provide the fastest processing speed ever among Ematic tablets. The familiar Desktop mode and included keyboard allows you to use your tablet as a computer. Its accessibility to Office 365 and compatibility with Microsoft Office make them ideal for business.
Meanwhile, multitaskers may find the side-by-side function a huge plus. With Windows 8.1, users can simultaneously manage different apps at the same time. Windows 8.1 comes with built-in free apps that help you download the latest music, watch the latest movies and TV shows on , edit photos, play games, read the news, and more. Some apps included are mail, music, games, calendar, finance, food + drink, reading list, weather, sports, travel, news, and more.
The tablets are also upgradable to Window 10 to make sure you enjoy the latest technology improvement. Both of the tablets have 32GB storage and 1GB RAM, a plenty room for downloading videos and games, meanwhile working smoothly. The built-in OneDrive provides 15GB of free online storage that comes with your Microsoft account.
These two tablets are available at all major online retailers, including Amazon, Walmart, Sears, Kmart and others.
For more information please visit: www.ematic.us
About Ematic:
Emetic’s innovative approach to providing superior technology in portable media has continued to impress consumers since 1985. Built on a solid foundation of technological advancement, our commitment to premier quality and value has earned us the reputation of the top-selling brand at War-Mart, QVC, Radio Shack, Tiger Direct and other fine retailers. From eReaders to Android Tablets, Ematic offers a solid range of durable electronic accessories with an undeniably low price. Designed in California, all of our patented products are customizable in a wide array of color options to suit your personal style. In addition to an environmentally friendly office approach, Ematic also supports the community by donating ten percent of our total profits to charity.
